Package com.example.app.service

Interface OfficerService

All Superinterfaces:
ApplicantService, UserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
OfficerServiceImpl
public interface OfficerService extends ApplicantService
Service interface for managing officers. This interface extends the ApplicantService interface. It provides methods for managing officer-related operations, including project registration, enquiry handling, and application management.

  • Method Details

    • isHandling

      boolean isHandling(Officer officer, int projectId) throws IOException, NullPointerException
      Check if the officer is currently handling a project.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer
      projectId - the project ID
      Returns:
      true if the officer is handling the project, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      NullPointerException - if the officer is null

      List<Project> getRegistrableProjects(Officer officer) throws IOException, NullPointerException
      Get all projects that the officer can register for. Can contain projects that are not open for application for the officer Registration is different from application
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer
      Returns:
      a list of projects that the officer can register for
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      NullPointerException - if the officer is null

      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      NullPointerException - if the NRIC is null, or if the project is not found

    • generateBookingReceipt

      String generateBookingReceipt(int applicantId) throws IOException, NullPointerException
      Generate a booking receipt for the applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - the NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      the booking receipt
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the applicant has not booked a flat,
      NullPointerException - if the NRIC is null, or if the project is not found
